metadata.name: Powershell Token Obfuscation - Process Creation
metadata.comment: Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\w\+`\(\\w\+|-|.\)`\[\\w\+|\\s\]' AND process.cmd_line rlike '"\(\\\{\\d\\\}\)\+"\\s*-f' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\(?i\)\\$\\\{`?e`?n`?v`?:`?p`?a`?t`?h`?\\\}' AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('${env:path}')))

output.summary: Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation
